sections.title: Section
sections.description: Want to get in touch with the section or Media Technology? Contact us for more information!

sections.title: Business Group
sections.description: Does your company want to collaborate with us? Contact us for more information! We are always willing to discuss new ideas and opportunities.

sections.title: The Equality Group
sections.description: Do you have concerns about equality or want to get involved in the equality group? Contact us for more information!

sections.title: Media Branchday
sections.description: Does your company want to participate in Media Branchday? A yearly event where students and companies meet. Contact us for more information!

sections.title: Website
sections.description: If you have any questions or suggestions regarding the website, please contact the webmaster. We are always looking for new ideas and improvements!
